scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: In this collection, Erskine and Virginia Caldwell send Cornelia and Clifton Waller Barrett greetings, describe their month of travel, ask about the Barrett's new home, and enclose a photograph of a painting titled "Santa Fe Blues" recently delivered to the Jamison Gallery in Santa Fe. With these is a birthday card to Cornelia and a postcard, 1985 April 24, from "Kate" to the Barretts describing a trip to Poe's house in Philadelphia and Whitman's in Camden.
